name: Dragon Slayer Sword
description: A massive two-handed sword forged from dragon bone, with glowing runes along the blade

name: Elven Longbow
description: An elegant longbow made from ancient silverwood, with intricate leaf patterns

name: Wizard Staff
description: A gnarled oak staff topped with a floating crystal orb that pulses with magical energy

name: Dragon Scale Helmet
description: A fearsome helmet crafted from overlapping dragon scales with horn protrusions

name: Mithril Chestplate
description: Lightweight silvery armor with elegant engravings and magical protection runes

name: Grand Bank of Varrock
description: Impressive bank building with marble columns, golden vault door, and secure architecture

name: General Store
description: Cozy shop with wooden storefront, display windows showing various goods, and merchant sign

name: Magic Emporium
description: Mystical shop with glowing crystals in windows, arcane symbols on door, selling magical items

name: Iron Pickaxe
description: Sturdy mining tool with iron head and wooden handle, shows wear from use

name: Health Potion
description: Glass bottle filled with glowing red liquid, cork stopper, healing properties

name: Bread
description: Fresh baked bread loaf with golden crust

name: Iron Ore
description: Raw iron ore chunk with metallic veins visible in rock

name: Gold Bar
description: Refined gold bar with stamped markings, highly polished surface

name: Coins
description: Stack of golden coins with kingdom emblem

name: Goblin Warrior
description: A small but fierce goblin warrior with green skin and crude armor

name: Fire Drake
description: A medium-sized dragon with red scales and wings, breathing fire

name: Wizard Tower
description: A tall stone tower with magical crystals and floating platforms
